title: Educational Platform
description: An interactive platform offering a wide variety of courses, quizzes, and certifications.
details: LearnHub includes advanced analytics for teachers, personalized learning paths for students, and support for multiple languages.

title: League Profiler
description: A platform for analyzing and tracking player statistics in competitive leagues.
details: LeagueStats provides real-time data, performance analytics, and insights for team strategy.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A comprehensive app to monitor fitness activities, track goals, and measure progress.
details: FitTrack supports activity tracking, nutrition plans, and integrates with wearables like smartwatches.

title: Predication on Salary
description: Built a classification model to automate salary categorization for new hires, reducing negotiation time.
details: Utilised Python, Pandas, and Scikit-learn for data processing, model development, and evaluation. Improved decision-making efficiency by enabling accurate, data-driven salary predictions.
